metadata.title: Sea Level Heights (Canada -West Coast)

creators.name: Oceans, Institute of Ocean Sciences, Custodian Marine Environmental Data Service

metadata.description: Measurement Details:  tide gauges (various types) at coastal stations at 21 permanent stations along the BC Coast. CCC_Code: 2 Start of Observations: various (earliest is 1905). Tectonic activity complicates analysis of long term records.  URL http://www.meds-sdmm.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/meds/Databases/TWL/TWL_e.htm GLobal records for sealevel can be accessed at: http://www.nbi.ac.uk/psmsl/index.html
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Long term monitoring of sea levels.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Monthly

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
